settings.excerpt:
We believe in rescue for 2: Your complexion & animals in need.
We believe every morning should look like it was your best night's sleep.
And that socks should slide over your feet without snagging.

We believe in growing greens that are pure, potent, and proven to work.
And that new skin beginnings are just around the farm.

We 100% believe green smoothies should be its own food group.
And that a good pumpkin mask can turn any bad day around. For real.

We believe in being kind: to each other, to animals, and to the world.
We also believe donkey kisses have magical healing powers. Like actually.
And that glowy good skin starts with a glowy good soul.

Let’s get this rescue started …
settings.content_left_first: Microgreens are our specialty. These tiny potent botanicals are more nutrient dense than many full size vegetables! Grown sustainably through hydroponics and aquaponics, and harvested immediately, we harness high-nutrition extracts that bring out the best in your complexion.
settings.content_left_second:
Give us an hour, and walk out transformed! That's our promise to you. Our freshly harvested botanicals bring rapid results and splendid escapes served in Farm-to-Table style at thousands of spas, hotels and resorts around the world - from Dallas to Dubai.

In a FarmHouse Fresh spa service, you'll be gleaming from our tingling organic pumpkin puree facial mask and superfood serum made from Texas winery grapes that puts the bright in bright-eyed-and-bushy-tailed. It's true Farm to Treatment!®
settings.content_left_third: At FarmHouse Fresh®, you are part of every animal rescue, because your everyday skincare loves help fund, rescue, and rehabilitate abused animals -- those who come to our sanctuary and under our employee's care, and thousands more that are placed with marvelous rescue teams across the country who bring them back to life and find them forever homes.
settings.founding_subheading: QUIDAM OFFICIIS SIMILIQUE SEA EI, VEL TOLLIT INDOCTUM EFFICIENDI EI, AT NIHIL TANTAS PLATONEM EOS.
settings.texan_content: We’re proud members of Go Texan, as nearly 98% of FarmHouse Fresh products are made in Texas.

settings.heading: “Here’s a trio of foot scrubs that smell so     good, I want to serve them over berries!”
settings.copy: Our first product was a sea salt exfoliation trio created in 2005, when founder Shannon McLinden discovered a way to keep cracked heels at bay by combining fine grain sea salt with rice bran oil. Oprah selected this kit for her O-list proclaiming “Here’s a trio of foot scrubs that smell so good, I want to serve them over berries!”
settings.text: LEARN MORE

settings.heading: Southern Makers on Pinterest
settings.copy:
Today we are proud “Southern Makers on Pinterest,” selected by Southern Living Magazine as one of their “favorite companies making beautiful products, right here in the South”!

Our products continue to win consumer magazine awards including Redbook’s Most Valuable Beauty Product Award, Southern Living Magazine’s Beauty Awards, Essence Best in Black Beauty Awards, Elle Canada Hot List, and more. We’ve been honored with Oprah’s O-List twice and most recently created custom local gourmet milk soaps for the December O Issue!
settings.text: LEARN MORE

settings.heading: Offering the most distinctive selection of Farm to Spa Treatments
settings.copy: FarmHouse Fresh is proudly voted by spas, hotels and resorts as their Favorite Body Care Line, selected through American Spa Magazine’s Professional’s Choice Awards. Our Organics Collection received Day Spa Magazine’s Professional’s Choice Awards for Favorite Organic Collection.
settings.text: LEARN MORE

settings.heading: “Skincare Company also Runs Rescue Full of Inspiring Animals”
settings.copy: People Magazine featured our FarmHouse Fresh Ranch Headquarters, which is also home to our registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit farm animal sanctuary, spotlighting our unique "skincare that saves" mission. Profits from FarmHouse Fresh product purchases help fund, rescue, and rehabilitate abused animals that our employees help care for at the FarmHouse Fresh Sanctuary.
settings.text: LEARN MORE

settings.heading: This CEO wants to save women's complexions — and farm animals — one jar at a time
settings.copy: Shannon McLinden, CEO & Founder of FarmHouse Fresh, chats with NBC's Know Your Value Founder Mika Brzezinski about her struggle to find her purpose, being an introverted entrepreneur, the importance of giving back and more.
settings.text: LEARN MORE

settings.heading: Live From the NY Stock Exchange
settings.copy: Shannon McLinden, Founder of FarmHouse Fresh, was interviewed live on the Cheddar business news network, which covers the most innovative executives, founders, products, and technologies transforming our lives and economy. The company broadcasts from the trading floor of the New York Stock Exchange. This ChedHer segment, sponsored by Chase Bank, celebrates representation and inclusion in business with today’s leaders, and shines a light on the women who are making strides in their industries.
settings.text: WATCH THE FULL LIVE EPISODE

settings.banner_heading: Our Roots: From Seed to Spa
settings.intro_text2:
We've had you in mind since we began - growing fresh tiny microgreens daily on our farm to pack a punch of nutrition in our skincare, so your complexion looks and feels like new.

We're wellness fanatics. Estheticians, massage therapists, product crafters and farmers. We love smoothies, spa days and the joy that animals bring to our lives. So we built our skincare headquarters to fund and operate our nonprofit farm animal sanctuary. Here at FarmHouse Fresh, our employees care for once-neglected animals and every product you buy helps us help them. See how it began below.

settings.title: Here, They're Home.
settings.text: These are the beautiful souls we see and care for every day at our headquarters. Many came under the most dire of circumstances, and they're part of our family now. We make them whole again, and ensure they live their best life at our ranch.

settings.title: Deep Hydration
settings.description: Try this amazing routine. Over 5 days, use these 3 products below. But to start, use Sand Your Ground as a spot treatment to bring your pimple to a head.

settings.intro_text: Our FarmHouse Fresh team grows and crafts skincare products that are two things: freshly harvested and deliciously served in spa treatments.
settings.content_left_first: Get drizzled in a warm honey-papaya serum or cocooned in a steaming nectar whole milk wrap. FarmHouse Fresh crafts the most transformative facials, pedicures and body massage treatments served at luxury spas, resorts and hotels around the world. Use our spa finder to book a service in your area. Or find one of thousands of boutique shops carrying our line.
settings.content_left_second: Radiant skin on the daily. Let our Licensed FarmHouse Fresh Esthetician-picks help you find a perfectly balanced skincare routine, for radiant skin you’ll love waking up to.
settings.content_left_third: From a liquor-infused Happy Hour treatment in the Caribbean to a Food for Skin Facial in Dubai, FarmHouse Fresh brings ever-changing farm to treatment® spa menus to the world of relaxation.

settings.intro_text2:
Plants nourish every aspect of your journey -- they are the richest source of vitamins, minerals, and phyto nutrients. So we grow them fresh daily, and blend them into everything we make for you.

What’s within is as important as what’s without. See what what you won't find in our products, below.
settings.content_left_first: We use an average of 97% natural and naturally derived ingredients in our products. This number is an estimate, based on raw materials in each product. Under ISO 16128 “Derived Natural” ingredients are greater than 50% natural origin by molecular weight by renewable carbon content, or by any other relevant methods, obtained through defined chemical and/or biological process with the intention of chemical modifications.
settings.content_left_second: We choose not to use PEG's and their derivatives, formaldehyde donors, and mineral oil. We're also free of parabens and sulfates. Sulfates can dry out skin and cause extra irritations for people with eczema. Parabens have been debated for quite some time. Although dermatologists generally prefer to use them (particularly to keep mold from growing in facial products that can come into contact with your eyes), and many dermatologists cite sound studies showing parabens are safe to use, there are plenty of alternative preservatives that are effective and that meet the demand from our customers to avoid using parabens.
settings.content_left_third: 99% of our products are vegan or gluten-free. We are strict in our use of the term vegan. Even if a bee naturally makes honey, and honey is in the product, that product is not considered vegan. For the most up-to-date information, please refer to the individual product pages on our website.

settings.intro_text: We grow so skin glows™ because we believe skincare products deliver powerful results when active ingredients are grown, harvested and extracted immediately.
settings.intro_text2: Freshly farmed ingredients from our farm and our other local growers have the ability to heal when they are just-grown, just-harvested, and just not traveling in hot containers across thousands of miles of ocean.  It’s good for the environment and it helps U.S. farms who care for their crops with every sunrise.

settings.farmer_content: A masterful hydroponic and aquaponic grower who is passionate about hydro farming for family homesteads. Using aquaponic and hydroponics, Chris grows our spearmint, basil, kale, red lettuce varieties, lemonbalm and more – all bringing high nutrition to our skincare.
settings.quote_content: Growing and keeping plants for skincare is not very common, and I love that. I love being able to grow for a living, I spend my days outside and see results from my work daily.

settings.farmer_content: Our organic cucumber rinds are zero waste, it’s Nelson’s laying chickens who get the leftovers! Nelson’s team grows organic cucumbers and tomatoes for us at his sustainable farm. Customers drive from all over to get Cartemere’s free range chicken eggs, and children get to take camp classes on running a farm.
settings.quote_content: My favorite part about working on a farm is the seasonality. Day by day having to adapt to the cards we are dealt. There are also seasons of nose to the grindstone and seasons of relaxation.... you have to take it all.

settings.farmer_content: Jeff and his family grow 365 days a year from their hydrofarm located in Lucas, Texas.  He's passionate about providing the absolute highest quality, best tasting lettuces, herbs and microgreens.
settings.quote_content: We grow harvests to make a profound impact for our family, our community, and make a positive environmental impact.

settings.intro_text2: Our farmers are (a little bit) fanatical about peak vitamins & phytonutrients in your skincare. So koi fish swim freely (creating aquaponic water) to nourish our microgreens. Organic cucumbers are harvested, cleaned, pulvarized and extracted the same day and unused pulp gets fed to the chickens. Zero waste!

settings.content_left_first: Our skincare headquarters is also home to our registered 501(c)(3) non-profit farm animal sanctuary, recently featured in People Magazine for our unique Skincare that Saves mission. Our employees care for all the beautiful souls who come here to be brought back to life and healed. Meet them here, and see countless others you've helped save with your purchases.
settings.content_left_second: See videos & photos of all the animal rescues made possible by you.
settings.content_left_third: Look for our “Hey Girl, HAY!” emails. Make your FHF purchase that day. 20% of sales are immediately donated to one of our favorite animal rescue groups.

settings.title: As a spa and wellness brand, we believe being “green” goes beyond preserving the environment and includes ensuring the wellbeing of the animals that inhabit it.

settings.intro_text2:
They simply would not exist without you. So many companion animals are abused, neglected and discarded - most of them are euthanized due to overcrowded shelters or sent to slaughter when no one steps in to save them.

You help by simply buying the skincare you love!

settings.heading: Holly Wydra
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Holly is a licensed Cosmetology Instructor and Esthetician, working in the beauty industry for over 20 years. Her passion for Skincare Education has been the most rewarding part of her career and she currently enjoys training both FHF team members and customers.

settings.heading: Becky Beall
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

As a licensed Medical & Oncology Esthetician, Becky has spent 18 years in the beauty industry. She is an expert in Skincare Rejuvenation with a focus on Anti-Aging - Correction and Repair.

settings.heading: Jennifer Howard
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Jennifer has been an Oncology and Medical Trained Licensed Esthetician for over 12 years.  She has provided Spa Management Consulting, as well as training in Facial treatments, Advanced Modalities & Waxing.  Jennifer loves empowering therapists with knowledge, confidence and new skills to create delight for their clients.

settings.heading: Valerie Sam
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

As a multi-state licensed Esthetician & Manicurist, Valerie has spent over 13 years in skincare & wellness.  Her experience includes Advanced Esthetics teaching and Spa Management within Resort Spas and Private Yacht Club facilities in the US and Caribbean.  Valerie enjoys working with advanced treatments such as anti-aging, chemical peels and non-invasive body therapy services.

settings.heading: Brittany Mason
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Brittany is a Regional Account Executive and Spa Educator for FHF. She is an honors graduate of the Ogle School of Hair, Skin, and Nails and has been a Licensed Medical Esthetician for over 5 years. Brittany is a Certified Laser Technician and has her Dermaplaning and Chemical Peel Certification. She has always had a passion for business development and the education side of esthetics, thus becoming her own spa owner and operator, and joining the FHF team last year. She enjoys helping our spa partners create custom treatments, training on product knowledge and sales strategies, and hosting Live Shows on social media.

settings.heading: Trisha Grimes
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Trisha is a licensed medical esthetician and national makeup artist/trainer.  She has been cultivating her knowledge of skin rejuvenation for over 15 years.  She works one on one with our FHF customers doing virtual consultations to select the appropriate skincare for their needs and also to teach them how to properly use their products to achieve optimal results.

settings.heading: Portia Amaris
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Portia is a licensed Esthetician who has spa experience as well as over 8 years of brand education experience. When she is not training spa’s on the latest skincare products and tools she is sharing all of that knowledge with you through instagram and Facebook live demos. Her expertise lies in preserving skins youthfulness through massage and natural skincare.

settings.heading: Jessica Wojewodzki
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Jessica has been a licensed Esthetician for 12 years in the skin care industry.  Jessica encompasses a holistic approach customizing treatments to allow the skin to achieve optimal health.

settings.heading: Brenda Marler
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Brenda has been a Licensed Esthetician for 16 years, working in the Luxury Resort Spa industry. She is an expert in LED Light Therapy, Chemical Peels & Advanced Modalities, as well as Luxury Body Treatments & Spa Management

settings.heading: Mary Caudle
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Mary has been a Licensed Esthetician for over 9 years. Her passion started as a young girl watching her grandmother and mom using beautiful creams on their skin. She is trained in Facial Treatments, Skin Analysis, and Electrolysis and truly enjoys working with people and helping them address their skincare needs.

settings.heading: Wendy Westbrook
settings.content:
Licensed Esthetician

Wendy is a Licensed Esthetician & Massage Therapist who is NCTMBW certified. With 16 years in the Luxury Resort Spa industry, her experience includes Cupping and Lymphatic Drainage, Oncology Massage, Energy Bodywork, Reflexology, Advanced Myofascial Techniques, Chemical Peels, Oxygen facials, Hydra facials, and Microcurrent treatments.

settings.intro_text2: Wonder where those rockstar results come from? Meet our team of Licensed Estheticians who steam, press, extract, mist, layer and test their way through the ideal formulas and regimens to bring out the best of your complexion.

settings.intro_text: We hope streaming our animals' world brings a little calm and peace to yours! Every face you see is here today because of you.

settings.title: For the love of animals
settings.text: When you make a donation to the FarmHouse Fresh® Animal Sanctuary, you are making a direct and immediate impact -- with 100% of your donation going to save neglected animals and providing critical medical care, housing, and nutrition. Be part of their journey as we document their transformations in our digital and print Farmanac.

settings.title: You matter to them
settings.text: Animals don't have a choice. When they have been starved, beaten, left unkempt, with wounds un-cared for, they are destined to die without kind people to step in and care them back to life. As a registered 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, we take great care with your funds, ensuring 100% goes to the care and rescue of animals. We do this by providing forever care and permanent residence for many animals who come to live at our Sanctuary, and by funding and supporting our favorite farm animal rescue groups working the front lines, to save the animals in the most need. These rescue groups focus on rehab and training, working tirelessly to find forever families for many of the animals. At the FarmHouse Fresh® Animal Sanctuary, all day-to-day caregiving is paid for through FarmHouse Fresh® skincare purchases, where profits from the sale of products fund employee time in feeding, cleaning, providing medical care and more.

settings.title: Compassionate, unwavering care
settings.text: We are passionate animal welfare advocates. It is the joy of our lives to love them, care for them and be their advocates, ensuring they have every chance of full recovery from cruelty and neglect, and a full life ahead of them. We provide the same care for the animals we save, as we care for our family members -- administering medications, massages, preparing special meals, ensuring vigilant medical attention including daily wound management, ordering x-rays, ultrasounds and specialized rehab treatments -- from water therapy to acupuncture. They are so precious to us. Your donation toward their care is greatly appreciated.

settings.title: Make a Tax-Deductible Donation to FarmHouse Fresh® Animal Sanctuary & Help Us Give Animals the Life They Deserve

settings.intro_title: Together, we’re saving the furriest among us.
settings.intro_text: Turn your jar upside-down! Type the code you see below, and see all the wonderful rescue initiatives made possible by you, in the very month your batch came off the line.
settings.main_text:
Use the search bar below to track the batch code you have purchased. Batch codes are printed on the under side of our jars and bottles. If you have a hand cream tube, it is a tiny number crimped into the top long edge of the tube (they’re sometimes tricky to read!)

- Remove the zeros at the start of a number
For instance, 002652 = 2652

- Remove the blank spaces in the middle of a number
For instance, 031 3D = 0313D

- Some tube crimps show 2 sets of numbers. Try each set individually.
settings.bottom_heading: Your everyday favorites are every day saving lives.
settings.bottom_text:
Your skincare dollars make an immediate difference. In a given month, profits from purchases of FarmHouse Fresh® products help us buy 10,000 pounds of hay, 1,000 pounds of grain, and nearly $1,000 in medical expenses for the FarmHouse Fresh® Sanctuary animals.

Your purchases also fund employee time in all day-to-day caregiving which includes feeding, cleaning, and administering medicine. As we save more animals throughout the year, we expand barns, fencing, and pasture shelters for the animal's living environment.

Your purchases don't stop there! They reach coast to coast, funding rescue organizations nationwide, who are working tirelessly, daily, to save, rehabilitate and rehome countless additional animals.

settings.heading: Amaranth
settings.content:
FHF-Grown Red Amaranth extract is a rich source of vitamin K – more nutrient dense than broccoli. Natural mica mineral powder gives a beautiful golden glow to skin.

Lustre Drench™ Instant Glow Dry Oil

settings.intro_text:
At FarmHouse Fresh®, we believe life is infinitely richer when we help those we love, and we LOVE animals.


What you buy changes lives.

The purchase of a single hand cream can directly place starving donkeys with a rescue group, pay for surgeries on injured animals dropped at a sale barn, or fly dogs on euthanasia lists to communities where they are adopted in days.

We've made it our life's work to make your skincare dollars stretch farther than you could have ever imagined, and you make these rescues possible.
